## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, }
#install.packages(,"tidyverse")
# install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
#devtools::install_github("tidyverse/ggplot2")
diamonds
#先看看diamonds依據那些類別分析
#first diagram:cut and count
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = cut)) +
geom_bar(fill = "blue", colour = "red")
#學到了geom_bar可以畫長條圖

#second diagram:price and count
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price)) + 
geom_histogram()
#histogram適用在連續的數據((先分析資料是離散還是連續很重要!!!!

#third diagram:depth and count
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = depth)) +
geom_histogram()
#再自己找其他的資料，判斷depth是連續性的資料
#看到圖片跑出來的成就感:)

#fourth diagram: price and depth
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y=depth)) +
geom_point()
#point是點陣圖，當兩個資料都是離散的時候用的

#fifth diagram: cut and depth
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=cut, y=depth)) +
geom_boxplot()
#學到boxplot，可以分析好多數據(四分位等等)
#自己判讀資料應該沒問題了，boxplot一個是連續一個是離散

# sixth diagram:
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=clarity, y=price)) +
geom_boxplot()
#小感言: 覺得繪圖沒有想像中難，雖然我畫的圖都滿陽春的，但是看到圖片跑出來還是很開心
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
